result.pre: (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). Abstract The rapid and global spread of a new
result.post: (SARS-CoV-2) has produced an immediate urgency to discover promising

result.pre: benefit of lopinavir/ritonavir combination therapy against COVID-19. Lopinavir is a
result.post: type 1 (HIV-1) protease inhibitor, and in a fixed-dose
